alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 2:20AM MST until December 15 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Sonoran Desert National Monument, Southeast Yuma County, Aguila Valley, Gila River Valley, Kofa, Parker Valley, Central La Paz County, Yuma, Gila Bend and Tonopah Desert. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 3 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.
